show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Dispatches from the Media Revolution: Media Censorship and the New Social Movements. We begin by looking at media... <!--more--> censorship with guests from the News Enlightenment Project in Breman, Germany.
At the bottom of the hour we hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio with the labor calendar; and for the second half of the program we interview Michael Levitin of the Occupy Wall Street Journal and Chris Ponzi from Rebellious Truths.
